about.disclaimer: Mastodon is free, open-source software, and a trademark of Mastodon gGmbH.
about.domain_blocks.preamble: Mastodon generally allows you to view content from and interact with users from any other server in the Fediverse. These are the exceptions that have been made on this particular server.
about.domain_blocks.silenced.explanation: You will generally not see profiles and content from this server, unless you explicitly look it up or opt into it by following.
about.domain_blocks.silenced.title: Limited
about.domain_blocks.suspended.explanatio: No data from this server will be processed, stored or exchanged, making any interaction or communication with users from this server impossible.
about.domain_blocks.suspended.title: Suspended
about.not_available: This information has not been made available on this server.
account.browse_more_on_origin_server: Browse more on the original profile
account.featured_tags.title: {name}'s featured hashtags
account.followers.empty: No one follows this user yet.
account.follows.empty: This user doesn't follow anyone yet.
account.link_verified_on: Ownership of this link was checked on {date}
account.locked_info: This account privacy status is set to locked. The owner manually reviews who can follow them.
account.moved_to: {name} has indicated that their new account is now:
account.requested: Awaiting approval. Click to cancel follow request
column_back_button.label: Back
compose_form.encryption_warning: Posts on Mastodon are not end-to-end encrypted. Do not share any sensitive information over Mastodon.
compose_form.hashtag_warning: This post won't be listed under any hashtag as it is unlisted. Only public posts can be searched by hashtag.
compose_form.lock_disclaimer: Your account is not {locked}. Anyone can follow you to view your follower-only posts.
compose_form.poll.switch_to_multiple: Change poll to allow multiple choices
compose_form.poll.switch_to_single: Change poll to allow for a single choice
compose_form.sensitive.hide: {count, plural, one {Mark media as sensitive} other {Mark media as sensitive}}
compose_form.sensitive.marked: {count, plural, one {Media is marked as sensitive} other {Media is marked as sensitive}}
compose_form.sensitive.unmarked: {count, plural, one {Media is not marked as sensitive} other {Media is not marked as sensitive}}
confirmations.block.message: Are you sure you want to block {name}?
confirmations.cancel_follow_request.mess: Are you sure you want to withdraw your request to follow {name}?
confirmations.delete.message: Are you sure you want to delete this post?
